label: What is CodeX Technolife?
answer: CodeX Technolife Pvt. Ltd. is an Indian IT solutions company offering services in web, app, and software development, cloud computing, and digital transformation.

label: Where is CodeX Technolife located?
answer: The company is located at S-R-S Tower, 2nd Floor, 2/1A Studio Lane (Haltu), Kolkata, West Bengal, India.

label: When was CodeX Technolife established?
answer: CodeX Technolife was incorporated on March 29, 2025.

label: What kind of clients does CodeX Technolife serve?
answer: We work with startups, enterprises, and organizations seeking scalable and customized software and IT solutions.

label: What services does CodeX Technolife provide?
answer: Our services include website and mobile app development, AI/ML solutions, cloud and cybersecurity services, digital marketing, and enterprise software development.

label: Does CodeX Technolife build custom software?
answer: Yes, we specialize in developing custom software solutions tailored to client requirements.

label: Do you offer web design and UI/UX development?
answer: Yes, we provide professional web design and UI/UX development focusing on modern and responsive interfaces.

label: Can CodeX Technolife help in mobile app development?
answer: Absolutely. We design and develop Android, iOS, and cross-platform mobile applications.

label: Does CodeX Technolife provide e-commerce solutions?
answer: Yes, we create secure, scalable, and customizable e-commerce platforms with integrated payment gateways.

label: Does CodeX Technolife work with international clients?
answer: Yes, we collaborate with clients globally for remote project delivery and long-term partnerships.

label: What industries does CodeX Technolife serve?
answer: We serve industries including IT, education, healthcare, retail, finance, and entertainment.

label: How can I request a project quote?
answer: You can fill out the contact or project inquiry form on our website, or email us directly.

label: Does CodeX Technolife sign NDAs for projects?
answer: Yes, we sign Non-Disclosure Agreements (NDAs) to ensure client data and idea confidentiality.

label: What technologies do you use?
answer: We work with modern stacks including Java, Python, React, Node.js, Flutter, TensorFlow, AWS, and Azure.

label: Do you offer maintenance and support after delivery?
answer: Yes, post-deployment maintenance and technical support are included in most service packages.

label: How do you ensure data security?
answer: We implement strict data protection standards, encryption, and access control to safeguard client data.

label: Do you provide hosting and deployment support?
answer: Yes, we assist with cloud hosting, CI/CD setup, and deployment on AWS, Azure, or other platforms.

label: Can I hire dedicated developers from CodeX Technolife?
answer: Yes, we provide dedicated developer hiring models for short-term and long-term projects.

label: Do you work on fixed-cost or hourly projects?
answer: We offer both fixed-price and hourly billing models depending on project scope and duration.

label: What is the typical project delivery timeline?
answer: Project duration varies with complexity; typical projects range from 2 weeks to 3 months.

label: Does CodeX Technolife offer cloud migration services?
answer: Yes, we help businesses move infrastructure and applications to secure cloud environments.

label: What is your project communication process?
answer: We use agile methodology, providing weekly progress reports and regular meetings via email or video calls.

label: Can I track project progress?
answer: Yes, clients receive access to project updates and task trackers for transparency.

label: Do you provide documentation and training post-development?
answer: Yes, we deliver full technical documentation and training sessions if required.

label: What payment methods are accepted?
answer: We accept bank transfers, UPI, PayPal, and major international payment options.

label: Can I get a free consultation?
answer: Yes, we offer free initial consultations to discuss project needs and feasibility.

label: Is CodeX Technolife open to long-term partnerships?
answer: Yes, we actively collaborate in long-term product development and IT partnership models.

label: Do you provide AI or machine learning solutions?
answer: Yes, our team builds predictive models, recommendation systems, and analytics platforms using ML frameworks.

label: Can CodeX Technolife build ERP or CRM systems?
answer: Yes, we design and implement enterprise-grade ERP and CRM systems.

label: How can I contact support?
answer: For any queries or issues, you can contact us via our support email or website chat system.

label: Does CodeX Technolife offer internships?
answer: Yes, we provide internships in software development, data science, design, and digital marketing.

label: How can I apply for a job at CodeX Technolife?
answer: You can apply directly through our website’s Careers page or email your resume to HR.

label: What skills do you look for in candidates?
answer: We seek passionate candidates skilled in programming, problem-solving, and teamwork.

label: Is there a technical interview process?
answer: Yes, shortlisted candidates go through a coding test followed by technical and HR interviews.

label: Do you hire freshers?
answer: Yes, we regularly hire fresh graduates and provide training under our mentorship programs.

label: Do you offer remote work opportunities?
answer: Yes, depending on the project, we offer hybrid and remote job roles.

label: What is the typical recruitment timeline?
answer: Recruitment usually takes 1–3 weeks from application to offer, depending on the role.

label: Are internships paid?
answer: Yes, most internships come with stipends or performance-based incentives.

label: What technologies do interns work with?
answer: Interns work on live projects using Java, Python, React, ML models, or Android development.

label: How long are internship durations?
answer: Internships typically range from 2 to 6 months based on the project and role.

label: Do you provide certificates for internships?
answer: Yes, all interns receive official completion certificates from CodeX Technolife.

label: Is there an option for full-time placement after internship?
answer: Yes, high-performing interns are often offered full-time roles.

label: What is the work culture at CodeX Technolife?
answer: We promote innovation, learning, and collaboration in a supportive and inclusive environment.

label: Does CodeX Technolife provide training programs?
answer: Yes, employees and interns receive continuous learning through workshops and tech sessions.

label: Are there growth opportunities within the company?
answer: Yes, we value internal promotions and skill-based advancement.

label: Can students from outside Kolkata apply for internships?
answer: Yes, remote internship options are available for students across India.

label: What documents are required for applying?
answer: Resume, cover letter, and optionally a portfolio or GitHub profile link.

label: What departments recruit most often?
answer: Software Development, Frontend & Backend, AI/ML, UI/UX Design, and Digital Marketing.

label: Do you conduct campus placements?
answer: Yes, we collaborate with universities for campus recruitment and internship drives.

label: Can I reapply if I was rejected earlier?
answer: Yes, candidates may reapply after 3 months with updated skills or projects.

label: Who can I contact for recruitment queries?
answer: You can reach our HR department through the contact form on our website.

label: Do you offer freelancing or part-time roles?
answer: Yes, depending on project demand, we offer part-time or contract-based roles.

label: Does CodeX Technolife have employee referral programs?
answer: Yes, employees can refer candidates and earn referral bonuses after successful hires.

label: Are there any ongoing hiring drives?
answer: Hiring drives are announced periodically on our official LinkedIn and website career page.

label: What benefits do employees get?
answer: Employees enjoy flexible work hours, learning opportunities, team events, and performance rewards.

label: How can I contact CodeX Technolife?
answer: You can reach us directly by phone at +91 947 456 2952 or email us at info@codextechnolife.com.

label: What is the official email address for business inquiries?
answer: For business or collaboration inquiries, please contact us at sales@codextechnolife.com.

label: What is the official support email for CodeX Technolife?
answer: For technical or general support, you can email info@codextechnolife.com.

label: Is there a separate email for sales-related queries?
answer: Yes, for any project discussions, quotes, or partnerships, contact sales@codextechnolife.com.

label: Can I call CodeX Technolife directly?
answer: Yes, our contact number is +91 947 456 2952. We’re available during standard business hours (Mon–Sat, 10 AM – 6 PM IST).

label: Where can I find CodeX Technolife’s office?
answer: Our office is located at S-R-S Tower, 2nd Floor, 2/1A Studio Lane (Haltu), Kolkata, West Bengal 700078, India.

label: Does CodeX Technolife have social media pages?
answer: Yes, we’re active on LinkedIn and other social media platforms. You can find the links on our official website.

label: What are the working hours of CodeX Technolife?
answer: Our support and business hours are Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM IST.

label: Is there a form to request a project quote?
answer: Yes, you can submit a quote or inquiry request through the Contact Us section on our website.

label: Can clients visit the office for project discussions?
answer: Yes, visits are welcome by prior appointment. Please contact us via phone or email to schedule a meeting.
